LA Clippers came away with a 110-96 win over the Mavericks during the preseason game.
Veteran forward Derrick Jones Jr. played against his former team for the first time since joining the Clippers in free agency and helped his new team with 12 points and four rebounds.
Quentin Grimes had his best game of the preseason with a team-high 20 points.
P.J. Washington returned to the lineup and finished with 10 points, three rebounds, and three steals.
Klay Thompson struggled on the offensive end and went scoreless, missing all nine of his shot attempts, including six 3-pointers.
